title: Retrieves job agent six month summary
description: Retrieves a six month summary of a job agent's activity
permission_required: MyTradeMeRead: Read your membership & listing data.

path.name: memberId
path.description: The member id to retrieve the summary for. Must be the authenticated member

returns.description: Collection of <JobAgentMonthSummary> A collection of monthly summary objects

fields.name: MonthsAgo
fields.description: Number of months ago where the current month is 0

fields.name: Month
fields.description: Date of the first day of the month

fields.name: ListingCount
fields.description: Number of listings started that month. Will be -1 if no data available for this agent.

fields.name: ApplicationCount
fields.description: Number of applications across all listings that month. Will be -1 if no data available for this agent.

fields.name: VisitCount
fields.description: Number of views across all listings that month. Will be -1 if no data available for this agent.
